title: Crucibulum auricula
text:
Crucibulum auricula is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Calyptraeidae">Calyptraeidae</a>, the slipper snails or slipper limpets, cup-and-saucer snails, and Chinese hat snails.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 29 mm.
Habitat.
The minimum recorded depth for this species is 1 m; maximum recorded depth is 115 m.
